c74object.name: pmenu
c74object.description: Displays a pop-up menu. Selections will be output the first outlet and optional data can be attached to each entry.

outlet.description: Menu item evaluated as message and prepended with optional prefix
Arbitrary data associated with menu item

method.name: dictionary
method.digest: Name of dictionary to use to build menu
method.description: Name of dictionary to use to build menu

attribute.name: prefix
attribute.description: Sets a menu-wide prefix that will be prepended to all menu items when output

c74object.discsussion:
The
pmenu
object clones dictionaries it receives and will not update based on changes to the original dict the dictionary needs to have at the top level a name key which is a string and a contents key which points to an array. the array can hold strings, other dictionaries with name and content keys (for submenus). Entries in the menu can also be a dictionary with a name key and data key. The values in the data key are ouput the 3rd outlet when the menu item is selected.
For instance, a simple menu would look like this in json/dict
{ "name" : "foo", "contents" : ["bar", "baz", "foobar", "foobaz"]
}
